item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:10, topic:345923”][quote author=staypuff link=topic=442303.msg3250402#msg3250402 date=1277701393]
Do you know the id of any already in the cache of most servers if not all?
[/quote]
If you mean the rotation thing, it’d be easy to make one in RsPoser. Just rotate body lol.[/quote]

i know that there is that but, I would find it better if there was already one in the cache that people knew the ID of. That way i can prevent a download.

item.title: PVP Auras [no models needed!][Update = Autokeep]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[center]

Purpose: These are a great way for clans on your server to use as a manner of telling them apart. When wielded as an amulet, you can still choose what ever other armour you want while giving up a tiny amulet for a nice symbol of your clan/team.

Place these in class8.java (client side) and don’t forget to add the item ID’s you use to item.java (serverside) as amulets. (you can then add stats via item.cfg (serverside in config folder))[/center]

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (Ora)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (blk)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 912; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (red)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 37800; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (blu)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 54988; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (pin)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 21422; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (gre)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 3008; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 255; class8.anInt174 = 1131; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1131; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1131; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 2000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Evil Aura (whi)"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "666".getBytes(); }

Now, to make them auto keep, open up client.java (serverside) and search:

public void youdied()

And add this to the void after the first “{”. Don’t forget you need one for every ring you add and have to change the #### to match each ring.

if(playerHasItem(####)){ deleteItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); }
[that code means that if some one dies and has item #### it will be deleted rather then dropped, and then re-added after they respawn.]

Read full topic
